stimulusHtml: Scholars believe that the tunnels in the architectural complex at Chavín de Huántar were intended to create an otherworldly environment by manipulating space and light; more recent excavations have revealed that the tunnels may also have
choicesHtml: led to underground tombs filled with luxury goods
been strategically placed to create a distinct auditory experience
served as passageways between public spaces and living quarters
been aligned to symbolize the movement of certain astronomical bodies
